'''Bayajidda''' is an open-world [[NPC]] located in {{Location|Stadium of the Sacred Flame}}.

Following a certain dialogue branch for the first time gives the player one [[Guide to Conflict]].

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Bayajidda:''' Hello! Need any help?
:{{DIcon}} And you are...?
::'''Bayajidda:''' I'm a volunteer at the Stadium of the Sacred Flame. When the competition's on, I'm responsible for maintaining order inside, guiding contestants to where they should be, and so on.
::'''Bayajidda:''' I also wander around between matches to see if anyone needs help.
::'''Bayajidda:''' Anyway, things have been a bit quiet lately, so if you need any help at all, don't hesitate to let me know!
::'''Bayajidda:''' Oh, and if you'd like to join our team of volunteers, just say the word and it shall be so!
::{{DIcon|Reward}} I'll swing by when I'm free.
:::'''Bayajidda:''' Thanks!
:::'''Bayajidda:''' Enjoying exciting competitions as a volunteer is also a great experience.
::;(Obtain {{Item|Guide to Conflict|x=1}})
:{{DIcon}} I don't need it at the moment, thank you.
::'''Bayajidda:''' Glad to hear it.
{{Dialogue End}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{w|Bayajidda}} was a legendary figure said to be the founder of {{w|Hausa people|Hausa}} states in accounts prior to the 19th century.
